title: Scary Stories To Tell In The Dark
description:
Do you remember the book series "Scary Stories To Tell In The Dark?" Our first story is an edited version of "The Drum." Then, Sapphire chats with Cody Meirick, creator of the Scary Stories To Tell In The Dark documentary, available on video-on-demand today!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
